=============
clear_filters
=============

.. js:function:: clear_filters() 

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Item class </refs/client/item_api>`

Description
===========

Use ``clear_filters`` to set filter values of the item to ``null``.

See also
========

:doc:`Filtering records </programming/data/filtering_records>`

:doc:`Filters </programming/data/filters>`
